channel.title: [DELTA] Ags tweak

item.title: [DELTA] Ags tweak
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“ServerPKisfun, post:1, topic:433707”]i wanna tweak my ags to hit a little higher on the spec. my max so far is 55 and i want it to max out at like 78 or 80. heres the code from client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(305); specialAmount -= 50; getHit(5); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee) + misc.random(20); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(729); }[/quote]
Ima be honest i dont know how to do it in delta withut changing the weapon stats in item.cfg but ima guess
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) - the max hit

  • misc.random(StrPrayer) - the bonus for theprayer
  • misc.random(voidmelee) - the void melle bonus
  • misc.random(20); - a random number 1- 20 added to the hit i think so change this to a higher number and it sholud hit higher or look for the playerMaxHit class

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Ags tweak
item.dc:creator: @ServerPKisfun ServerPKisfun
item.description:
@ServerPKisfun wrote:

i wanna tweak my ags to hit a little higher on the spec. my max so far is 55 and i want it to max out at like 78 or 80. heres the code from client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(305); specialAmount -= 50; getHit(5); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee) + misc.random(20); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(729); }
